hasAttributes.name: ProjectId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Project.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectTypeId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Project Type.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectPlannedStartTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The planned start timestamp of a Project.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectPlannedEndTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The planned end timestamp of a Project.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectEarliestStartTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The earliest start timestamp of a Project.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectEarliestEndTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The earliest end timestamp of a Project.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectLatestStartTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The latest start timestamp of a Project.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectLatestEndTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The latest end timestamp of a Project.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectClosingTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The closing timestamp of the project.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectRiskAssessmentStatement
hasAttributes.description: A statement in which planners identify potential risks and describe them, usually in terms of their symptoms, causes, probability of occurrence and potential impact.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectWorkStatement
hasAttributes.description: A description of the scope of a project centered on the major deliverables and constraints.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectCharterStatement
hasAttributes.description: A document that describes the project at a high level of detail and is used to authorize the project management to begin work.

hasAttributes.name: BusinessCaseStatement
hasAttributes.description: The information that describes the justification for the project. The project is justified if the expected benefits outweigh estimated costs and risks. The business case is often complex and may require financial analysis, technical analysis, organization impact analysis and a feasibility study.

hasAttributes.name: LocationId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Location.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectGlAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: The GL Account Number assigned to a Project.

hasAttributes.name: ResponsibilityCenterId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Responsibility Center.

definitions.description: A project is a temporary activity with a starting date, specific goals and conditions, defined responsibilities, a budget, a planning, a fixed end date and multiple parties involved.
